# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a valuable asset worth $100 to you, and we're eager to share its benefits with you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $95. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the exceptional quality and value we promise. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
